name: jou
description: Game Jam template based on colyseus

scripts.build: yarn workspace @jou/common build && yarn workspace @jou/demo build && concurrently -n server,client "yarn workspace @jou/server build" "yarn workspace @jou/client build"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n common,demo,client,server "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/client dev" "yarn workspace @jou/server dev"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently -n common,demo,client "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/client dev"
scripts.dev:server: concurrently -n common,demo,server "yarn workspace @jou/common dev" "yarn workspace @jou/demo dev" "yarn workspace @jou/server dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n server,client "yarn workspace @jou/server start" "yarn workspace @jou/client start"
